decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Heritage Statement, undated, received 26/03/2015; Design and Access Statement, dated July 2014, received 29/04/2015; 2013-0001-008, dated 11.03.2015, received 11/06/2015; 2013-0001-009, dated 11.03.2015, received 02/07/2015; 2013-0001-007, dated 10.03.2015, received 02/07/2015; 2013-0001-012, dated 06.07.2015, received 06/07/2015; 2013-0001-011, dated 06.07.2015, received 06/07/2015; 2013-0001-010, dated 06.07.2015, received 06/07/2015; 2013-0001-003, dated 06.07.2015, received 06/07/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The development shall not be occupied until all existing cabling, CCTV equipment, satellite dishes, security lights and similar installations and their associated mounting brackets has been removed, and any disruption to building fabric has been be made good to match its surroundings in materials, colour and texture within one month of the removal.  No telecommunications equipment and cabling or security lighting shall thereafter be installed on the building without the prior approval in writing of the local planning authority, obtained through the submission of applications for Listed Building Consent and planning permission.

Condition : 4 - No work permitted by this consent shall commence until a schedule of windows to be retained or replaced and their detailed specification has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The development shall be carried out using the approved specification.
description: Listed Building Consent for part demolition of existing building and creation of a office space on ground floor and four apartments on ground, first and second floors. Erection of a new three storey building comprising a pair of semi-detached houses.
